articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Test-fire of Newly Developed Anti-tank Guided Weapon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Test-fire of Newly Developed Anti-tank Guided Weapon
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- National defence scientists and munitions industry workers of the DPRK rounded off the development of one more Juche-based weapon of Korean style which may outrun the enemies' numerical and technical advantages through their painstaking research.
					 The test-fire of the newly developed anti-tank guided weapon was staged in the presence of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 When he ordered to fire, the targets were destroyed to pieces.
					
					 He said that it was wonderful firing, indeed, adding: The portable anti-tank laser-guided rocket produced by the munitions industry workers of the DPRK has the longest firing-range in the world. Its rate of hits is as accurate as a sniper's rifle firing and its armor penetrating capability and destructive power are marvelous. 
					
					 He noted with great satisfaction that even the special armored tanks and cars of the enemies which boast their high maneuverability and striking power are no more than a boiled pumpkin before the anti-tank guided weapon of the DPRK.
					
					 He said that the anti-tank rocket comprehensively reflects the military strategic idea of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on guerilla warfare.
					
					 Noting the weapon most vividly reflects his idea of putting all weapons and equipment on an accurate and light weight basis and it is an impeccable Juche-based weapon that meets the specific conditions of the country, he said with pride that the test-fire of the Juche-based weapon helps realize how just the above-said policy is.
					
					 Noting combat and technical specifications of the anti-tank guided weapon have perfectly reached the level set by the Party, he called for quickly starting the massive and serial production of those weapons and sufficiently deploying them at frontline units and coastal defence units so that a bold campaign for hunting enemy tanks and armored cars may be conducted in contingency.
					
					 He thanked in the name of the Central Military Commission of the WPK the relevant scientists, technicians and munitions factory for developing the weapon system.
					
					 Calling on the sector of the national defence scientific research and all the workers of the munitions industry to channel their efforts into developing Juche-based weapons suited to the topography of the country and physical conditions of soldiers, he advanced militant tasks to be carried out by the munitions industry during the 70-day campaign and this year.
					
					 Accompanying him were Vice-Marshal of the Korean People's Army Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Army General Ri Myong Su, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, Army Col. General Yun Tong Hyon, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, Army Lieut. Gen. Jo Nam Jin, vice-director of the Organizational Department of the KPA General Political Bureau, and vice department directors of the Central Committee of the WPK Jo Yong Won, Hong Yong Chil, Kim Chang Gwang and Kim Jong Sik.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Reply Message from General Secretary of C.C. of LPRP
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Reply Message from General Secretary of C.C., LPRP
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a reply message from Bounnhang Vorachith, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party (LPRP), on Feb. 15.
					 Bounnhang Vorachith in the message expressed sincere thanks to Kim Jong Un for sending warm congratulations and best wishes to him on his election as general secretary of the Central Committee of the LPRP.
					
					 Your congratulatory message greatly encourages me to steadily lead the revolutionary cause and surely attain the goals of socialism as it demonstrated the fraternal solidarity and revolutionary friendship, the message noted, adding:
					
					 Availing myself of this auspicious opportunity, I wish you good health, happiness and success in your noble work.
					
					 I sincerely hope that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties, states and peoples of Laos and the DPRK would steadily grow strong.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Presidency of Bosnia and Herzegovina
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Presidency of Bosnia and Herzegovina
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a message of greeting from Dragan Covic, president of the Presidency of Bosnia and Herzegovina, on January 19.
					 The president in the message extended sincere congratulations and best wishes to Kim Jong Un and the people of the DPRK on behalf of the Presidency of Bosnia and Herzegovina and on his own behalf on the 20th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between Bosnia and Herzegovina and the DPRK.
					
					 On this meaningful day I am firmly convinced that the relations between our two countries would further develop in the interests of the peoples of the two countries and for world peace and security, the message said.
					
					 It sincerely wished Kim Jong Un and the people of the DPRK happiness.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Leaves for Switzerland
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Leaves for Switzerland
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong left here Saturday to take part in the 31st Session of the UN Human Rights Council to be held in Geneva.

articles.title: Progress Made in Land and Marine Transport of DPRK
articles.content:
Progress Made in Land and Marine Transport of DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Workers in the land and marine transport field of the DPRK are making achievements through the ongoing 70-day campaign.
					 On the 23rd and 24th of this month the Ministry of Land and Marine Transport carried out its plan on all indices at 107 percent.
					
					 According to Song Jong Chol, department director of the Ministry, it set its monthly and daily campaign goals in a workable and concrete way, concentrating efforts on their materialization.
					
					 The Ministry has planned to considerably increase the transit volume at trade ports and freightage by ships and trucks and, at the same time, consolidate the material and technical foundations of ports, barrage offices and dockyards in the country.
					
					 Meanwhile, a brisk drive was launched to make an innovation in the construction of cargo and passenger ships and pilot boats, harbor crane installation and bus production.

articles.title: Power Production Goes Up in DPRK
articles.content:
Power Production Goes Up in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- All the employees at thermal power plants in the DPRK have turned out in the 70-day campaign to raise the production of electricity.
					 In this regard, Ryu Ki Chan, vice-director of the Ministry of Electric Power Industry, told KCNA:
					
					 Thermal power plants across the country are now displaying their capability to the full for increased production.
					
					 The Pukchang Thermal Power Complex, a leading electricity producer, turned out 60,000 more kws of electricity in recent three days as against the same period of last year. 
					
					 The Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex produces more 10,000 kws of electric power every day than scheduled quota while the Sunchon Thermal Power Complex carries out its daily production plan at 105 percent by making technical innovations on a mass basis and raising the efficiency of turbines to the maximum.
					
					 Such progress is also reported from East Pyongyang and Chongchongang thermal power plants.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Condemns Park Geun Hye's Pro-Japanese Acts
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Condemns Park Geun Hye's Pro-Japanese Acts
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group is a mean horde of traitors to the nation who are selling out the dignity and sovereignty of the nation to Japan and working round the clock to stay in power in return for its sycophancy.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have become all the more undisguised in their moves to distort the history and grab Tok Islets since the emergence of the puppet regime. These behaviors would be unthinkable without the Park group's attitude of kowtowing to Japan and humiliating diplomacy.
					
					 It is an ulterior motive of the puppet ruling forces to curry favor with their master Japan and realize their daydream of stifling the compatriots in the north in collusion with it.
					
					 For this reason the Park group has connived at the Japanese reactionaries' moves to distort the history and grab Tok Islets, shutting its eyes to the nationwide mounting anti-Japanese sentiments and talking about "separate handling" of the issues of the past history and the security matter.
					
					 The Park group is keeping the door of reinvasion open to the sworn enemy of the Korean nation, kowtowing to them and begging for "cooperation in the anti-north campaign" to stifle the compatriots, instead of demanding Japan's apology and reparation for the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past.
					
					 The south Korean people can never escape shame and insult nor can the Korean nation be free from the danger of a nuclear war as long as these traitors are allowed to go scot-free. 
					
					 The only way is to mete out a merciless punishment to them as early as possible.

articles.title: Now Is Time to Give Vent to Pent-up Grudge against U.S. Imperialists: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Now Is Time to Give Vent to Pent-up Grudge against U.S. Imperialists: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The combined "beheading operation," the core of OPLAN 5015 recently worked out by the U.S. and south Korean puppet group, is an operation for preemptive strike to deprive the Korean people of something dearest to their life and destiny and undermine the mainstay supporting the just cause of the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an article. It goes on:
					
					 This is a blatant challenge which makes impossible for the servicepersons and people of the DPRK to exercise patience any longer and an unpardonable heinous crime which prompts them to give vent to their hatred and resentment like a nuclear explosion.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are egging the south Korean puppet regime on to ignite a fratricidal war.
					
					 They are the enemy of the Korean nation as they divided Korea and are inciting confrontation to block reunification.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which is making desperate efforts to deprive the Korean people and nation of their honor of being blessed with the sun generation after generation.
					
					 The supreme headquarters of the DPRK means the Workers' Party of Korea and the social system of the DPRK and represents its highest dignity and might.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists who have committed all sorts of crimes since their occupation of south Korea are now foolishly seeking to perpetrate a hideous crime against the sun protecting the destiny of the nation. 
					
					 The Korean people's hatred and resentment have been pent up for over 70 years. Now is the time to give vent to them.
					
					 It is high time the DPRK demonstrated the tremendous muscle, the manifold shield protecting the sun.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Anti-Chongryon Moves Accused
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Anti-Chongryon Moves Accused 
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Recently the Japanese police gangsters arrested the manager of a Korean trading company under the pretext of "illegal export" to the DPRK. This is the intentional and premeditated political provocation to defame the authority and image of the dignified General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and intensify oppression and suppression of it.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a commentary.
					
					 Noting that it is the main method of the Japanese reactionaries for suppressing Chongryon to often storm its institutions and search them as if they uncovered a big criminal organization, the commentary goes on:
					
					 The recent reckless acts vividly show wickedness and baseness peculiar to Japan and the turbulent political climate in Japan influenced by national chauvinism to justify its criminal moves to stifle Chongryon by widely spreading anti-Chongryon opinion in the whole society of Japan.
					
					 It is the black-hearted intention of the Japanese reactionaries to separate Korean businessmen from Chongryon by intensifying suppression of organizations of Korean traders and industrialists and economic bodies in Japan that are conducting legitimate economic activities, after branding them as "organizations resorting to illegal acts."
					
					 What is more serious is that the search was conducted just a few days after the announcement of the independent "sanctions" by the Japanese authorities peppered with strict restrictions of legitimate activities of Chongryon and content of trampling down upon the life and rights of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to think twice about the grave consequences to be entailed by their despicable anti-Chongryon moves.

articles.title: U.S. Military Provocation Bound to Meet Miserable Setback
articles.content:
U.S. Military Provocation Bound to Meet Miserable Setback
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The reckless moves of the gangster-like U.S. imperialists running wild like wolves, crying out for "beheading operation" and "high-density strike," are bound to meet a miserable setback before long in face of the DPRK's sacred war against them, say papers here Saturday.
					 Rodong Sinmun notes in an article:
					
					 The American Empire suffered such greatest political and military tragedy as going downhill after surrendering to the Korean people though it boasted of being "strongest" in the Korean war.
					
					 The DPRK and the U.S. have stood in confrontation since the ceasefire. This is evidenced by the U.S. imperialist armed spy ship Pueblo case, large spy plane EC-121 incident, Panmunjom case, DPRK-U.S. nuclear standoff, etc.
					
					 Every DPRK-U.S. acute military confrontation caused by the latter's provocations ended in the U.S. surrenders and apologies and the victory of the DPRK. The U.S. successive setbacks in the confrontation with the DPRK are remembered by the Americans as horrible events.
					
					 This land has turned into a base for the most horrible counter-attack, counter-strike threatening the U.S. mainland as all the Korean people are burning with towering resentment and firm resolution to take revenge upon the U.S. The enemies are trembling with fear in face of the strongest mental power of the service personnel and people of the DPRK firmly convinced of their just cause, which no one in the world can ever have or imitate, and in face of the masters of this land who took over the pledge to take revenge upon the U.S. as a legacy.
					
					 The moment an aggression is launched means the beginning of the U.S. miserable lot of going to its final ruin.
					
					 Minju Joson in a commentary says any "beheading operation" touted by the U.S. will end in a total failure leading to the final ruin of the U.S. and its followers in face of the merciless retaliatory strikes of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK Historian Derides Park Geun Hye as Modern-day Don Quixote
articles.content:
DPRK Historian Derides Park Geun Hye as Modern-day Don Quixote 
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Historian of the Academy of Social Sciences Ri Kun Chan issued an article titled "Modern-day Don Quixote carrying a dagger in skirt belt". 
					 The article said:
					
					 Recently lady of Chongwadae Park Geun Hye is going by another infamous name modern-day Don Quixote. 
					
					 She exactly resembles Don Quixote in the light of her outward appearance, to say nothing of her acts.
					
					 The only difference, if any, is gender but Park far surpasses Don in her actual behavior, the article said, revealing her crimes during the past three years in office.
					
					 Park regarding hostility as "confidence" and confrontation as "principle" talked about "improvement" of inter-Korean relations while deteriorating them and has desperately worked hard to keep the nation divided into two forever. Yet, she goes mischievous, allegedly claiming "curing" tragedy of the national division.
					
					 Outwardly she upholds a slogan calling for improving north-south ties and settling the issue of nation's reunification but in fact she crisscrosses alien countries only to beg for "international cooperation" aimed at escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north. 
					
					 Not content with crying out for confrontation with fellow countrymen, she wielded a dagger to brand the Kaesong Industrial Zone as a financial source for nuclear and satellite development.
					
					 She reeled off vituperations slandering the fair and aboveboard proposals made by the DPRK one after another for the improvement of the north-south relations, talking about "camouflaged peace offensive", "foreign propaganda" and "something for conflict among southerners".
					
					 She often strutted about the areas along the Military Demarcation Line in combat fatigues unbecoming to her skinny body where she shouted "Let's achieve unification under liberal democracy at the cost of lives!" and called for "stern punishment". 
					
					 She has turned south Korea into an outpost for a war against the north and a hotbed for a nuclear war by unhesitatingly introducing all types of nuclear war means of her American master. Yet, she claimed that "security crisis in the Korean Peninsula comes from the north" and is staging ceaseless nuclear war exercises. She, however, is misleading the public opinion, asserting that the north is chiefly to blame for "threat" and "provocations."
					
					 The desperate efforts of Park to provoke the DPRK which has joined the advanced ranks of world nuclear powers by having access to even H-bomb reminds one of Don Quixote dashing toward the big windmill risking his life.
					
					 The crimes she has committed by depriving the nation of its precious gain and pushing the inter-Korean relations to nightmare with a sharp dagger for escalating the confrontation deserve severe punishment, the author concluded.

articles.title: Past Crime Committed by Japan
articles.content:
Past Crime Committed by Japan
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- It has been 140 years after militarist Japan enforced "Kanghwa Island Treaty", an aggressive and predatory treaty, on the feudal government of Korea.
					 In 1875 the Japanese imperialists cooked up the warship "Unyo-maru" incident to find a pretext for armed invasion of Korea.
					
					 Then they dispatched to the coast of Pusan and Kwanghwa Island of Korea their several warships with more than 800 troops aboard and coerced its feudal government into a negotiation over the incident in mid-January 1876. At the negotiation they raised a unilateral and gangster-like demand and urged the Korean government to accept their demand, posing military threat.
					
					 Such pressure resulted in the said "treaty", the keynote of which called on the Korean side to open its harbors for Japan and allow it to survey seas around Korea and draw marine chart. After all, the "treaty" made it possible for Japan to attain its aims for aggression on Korea in political, economic, military and other aspects.
					
					 After forcing the "treaty", the Japanese imperialists cooked up the "Ulsa (1905) Five-point Treaty" and "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" to reduce Korea into its colony.
					
					 The history shows that a nation weak in military muscle can not defend its dignity and sovereignty.
					
					 With this truth cherished deep in their mind, the army and people of the DPRK are now hardening their will to force Japan, their sworn enemy, to settle all its past crimes and pay dearly price for them, by dint of the Songun (military-first) politics.

articles.title: Freedom of Assembly and Demonstration Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Freedom of Assembly and Demonstration Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- South Korean human rights activists and citizens met in Seoul on Feb. 24 to accuse the puppet conservative group of cracking down on meetings and demonstrations, according to Voice of People, south Korean internet paper. 
					 They demonstrated their actions against the dictatorial regime on a screen set up in Kwanghwamun in protest against the puppet authorities' measure of prohibiting all meetings and demonstrations in the avenues leading to Kwanghwamun and Chongwadae. 
					
					 They demanded the police not suppress citizens' rights with cordons and water cannons but ensure their peaceful meetings.
					
					 They marched toward Chongwadae.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Launch Signature Campaign against "Bill on Preventing Terrorism"
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Launch Signature Campaign against "Bill on Preventing Terrorism"
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- 46 progressive and civic organizations of south Korea including the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society launched a signature campaign against the "bill on preventing terrorism", according to the south Korean CBS.
					 The organizations have conducted the signature campaign in protest against the "bill on preventing terrorism" from Feb. 22.
					
					 The speaker of the puppet "National Assembly" brought up for discussion the "bill on preventing terrorism" at the full-dress session of the NA by abusing his power. Since then, the number of the participants in the campaign has been on rapid increase.
					
					 The organizations held a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 25. There are various laws and mechanisms geared for getting provided for "terrorism" in south Korea, they said, urging the regime to stop the moves to fabricate a new evil law.
					
					 They went to the NA to thrust a letter of protest signed by nearly 300,000 people from all walks of life to the NA speaker.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Distortion of History Condemned
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Distortion of History Condemned
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime is undisguisedly tampering with history in a bid to cover up Japan's past crimes and justify fascist military dictatorship in south Korea.
					 According to south Korean CBS on Feb. 24, it was disclosed that the authorities deleted the words "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army and related photos from the "state-compiled textbook" for the sixth year pupils of the primary schools this year, sparking off public criticism.
					
					 The part dealing with the May 18 Kwangju Popular Uprising did not contain words "martial law troops" hurled into the then fascist suppression and related photos and even injustice of the "yusin constitution" which were contained in the past textbooks.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Move to Clear "Bill on Preventing Terrorism" under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Move to Clear "Bill on Preventing Terrorism" under Fire 
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- South Korean organizations of various circles such as the Bar Association for Democratic Society, Society for Human Rights Movement and the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society held a news conference on Feb. 23 in protest against the puppet authorities' move to clear the "bill on preventing terrorism".
					 At the conference, the organizations expressed deep concern about human rights abuse as the bill contains all-inclusive and poisonous provisions granting the Intelligence Service (IS) too much authority regarding intelligence gathering, tracking, etc. 
					
					 They said that it is deplorable for the authorities to try to handle the bill quickly for the mere reason that it is the bill for which the "president" shows concern though the prevailing reality cannot be viewed as wartime and state of emergency.
					
					 The "government" is hyping the "terror threat from the north", not content with browbeating the people and the "National Assembly," claiming that a state of emergency may be created if it fails to invest the IS with greater authority to watch people, but it failed to explain a concrete reason, they said.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Unpopular Rule under Fire
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Unpopular Rule under Fire
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Headquarters of the All-out People's Action of south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on February 25, condemning the Park Geun Hye regime for having enforced unpopular rule for 3 years since its emergence.
					 Speakers at the meeting termed the three years of the Park regime the one characterized by anachronistic self-praise, social inequality and the worsening gender discrimination, suppression of trade unions, unending disasters, deterioration of working conditions and people's living and big profits of plutocrats and enterprise owners.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Personages of Syria, Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Personages of Syria, Peru
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Syrian and Peruvian figures issued statements on February 14 and 15 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Saber Ballul, head of Department of the Political Faculty of University of Damascus of Syria, praised Kim Jong Il for developing and enriching the Juche idea as the guiding idea in the era of independence and firmly defending the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and original Songun politics and turning the country into a large harmonious family.
					
					 Julio Cesar Pantigoso Barretto, president of the Chiclayo and Trujillo Branches of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, said that Peru significantly marked the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il as a great event, praising him for performing exploits in building a thriving nation and accomplishing the cause of national reunification and the global socialist cause.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Ideological and Theoretical Exploits Praised by Nigerian Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Ideological and Theoretical Exploits Praised by Nigerian Body
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website an article titled "Juche idea and leader Kim Jong Il" on February 16 to mark the 42nd anniversary of the proclamation of the programme for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					 The article said that Kim Jong Il in his early years made an overall analysis and review of the history of ideology of the preceding working class and drew a conclusion that the preceding theories cannot give correct answer to the theoretical and practical problems arising in the present era and that only the Juche idea, the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung, is the guiding idea in the era of independence. 
					
					 The article went on:
					
					 In his famous work "On Some Immediate Tasks of Party Ideological Work for Modeling the Whole Society on Kimilsungism" issued on February 19, 1974, he clarified that the revolutionary idea of the President is the integral system of ideology, theory and method of Juche and solemnly declared the Juche idea is the only guiding idea in the era of independence, new and unique idea which can be called after the President's august name-- Kimilsungism.
					
					 He issued the work "On the Juche Idea" on March 31, 1982, the article said, introducing the main contents of the work.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked in DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked in DPRK Missions Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Photo and book exhibitions, film shows, receptions and other events took place in the DPRK missions in Cuba, Laos, Mongolia, Indonesia, Myanmar, Thailand, Malaysia, the Czech Republic, Germany, Switzerland, Bulgaria, Spain, Egypt, Guinea and Senegal from February 11 to 16 in celebration of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos showing exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and their works, and books and photos introducing the efforts of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "Pyongyang Today," "Masikryong Ski Resort" and "Songdowon International Children's Camp."
					
					 Present at the events on invitation were personages of different social standings, representatives of groups for the study of the Juche idea and organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people in relevant countries. 
					
					 The general secretary of the National Democratic Party of Mongolia and the president of the Mongolian Peace and Friendship Organization said that the exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the country and its people would be immortal. 
					
					 A vice foreign minister of Myanmar praised Kim Jong Il as the great leader who turned the DPRK into a politico-ideological power and a military power with his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and wise leadership. 
					
					 The chairman of the German Communist Party said Kim Jong Il saved the cause of global socialism from crisis and the DPRK would advance along the way chosen by itself and be ever-victorious, no matter what others may say.
					
					 The honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union said the biggest exploit of Kim Jong Il was that he completely solved the issue of succession to the leadership.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Congratulated by Figure of Regional Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Congratulated by Figure of Regional Organization
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Marwan Sudah, chairman of the Arab Committee for Solidarity with Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea issued a statement on February 18 in congratulation of the DPRK's successful launch of the earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 The above-said successful satellite launch is a great success brought about by the DPRK's consistent Juche-oriented political line, he said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK manufactured the satellite with its own efforts and technology, not relying on any other countries, and put it into its orbit.
					
					 This clearly shows the science and technology of Juche Korea and potentialities of its industry.
					
					 The success achieved by the DPRK clearly proved once again that the idea of Marshal Kim Jong Un was the most powerful force leading world, a motive force for the development of the world community and a source of miracles making things impossible possible.
					
					 The DPRK's line and policies of developing science and technology are the original ones for the people that are quietly different from the West's policies of competition for existence.
					
					 I sincerely pay highest respect to HE Kim Jong Un who wisely led the Korean people to achieve the great success.
					
					 I extend warm congratulations to the Korean people, scientists and technicians.
					
					 I hope the Korean people would fully demonstrate the might of the country before the world in the future, too.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Confrontation Row against DPRK Blamed by Personages of Nigeria, DR Congo
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Confrontation Row against DPRK Blamed by Personages of Nigeria, DR Congo
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Personages of Nigeria and DR Congo issued statements on Feb. 18 and 19 in denunciation of the Japanese authorities' reckless confrontation racket against the DPRK.
					 Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said Japan's independent sanctions against the DPRK meant the unilateral scrapping of the DPRK-Japan inter-governmental Stockholm agreement and a provocation of escalating tension in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, chairman of the DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, said:
					
					 We can hardly repress indignation at Japan which is frantically clinging to its confrontation racket against the DPRK.
					
					 Japan should stop its sanctions row against the DPRK.
					
					 Sanctions will not work on the DPRK, independent and sovereign state and prosperous socialist country. 
					
					 The DPRK is a heroic country which won in the anti-Japanese armed struggle and the Korean war ignited by the U.S. imperialists and smashed all the imperialists' moves for stifling it under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 In order to evade the blame for entailing today's grave consequences, Japan would be well advised to behave itself.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon Accused by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon Accused by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Feb. 21 in denunciation of the Japanese authorities' politically-motivated suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement said that days ago the Japanese police authorities searched the offices of economic bodies under Chongryon and arrested a Korean trader.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The Japanese police authorities' suppression of Chongryon means a grave politically-motivated terror against the DPRK's sovereignty.
					
					 The reactionary Abe regime's terrorist act is part of its sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have worked hard to stifle Chongryon, a legitimate and dignified organization.
					
					 The politically-motivated terror against Chongryon is a reflection of the Japanese ruling quarters' national discrimination against the Korean people.
					
					 Still now, terror and suppression of Chongryon continue in Japan.
					
					 Such acts are a clear sign of abuses of rights of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Crucial Statement of KPA Supreme Command Supported by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Crucial Statement of KPA Supreme Command Supported by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Downplaying the might of the Korean People's Army (KPA) will make the war-thirsty U.S. imperialists and pro-U.S. Park Geun Hye group pay an indescribably high price.
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on Feb. 23.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' criminal "beheading operation" is a state subversion against the DPRK unprecedented in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The Supreme Command of the KPA clarified that all the powerful strategic and tactical strike means will go into operation for preemptive action of justice if even the slightest movement of the special operation forces and operation means of the U.S. imperialists are observed.
					
					 The KPA has an access to the powerful strike means capable of pounding the invaders any moment no matter wherever they might be.
					
					 The U.S. will certainly ruin sooner or later.
					
					 We fully support the crucial statement of the Supreme Command of the KPA.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Nigerian Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Nigerian Organization on Its Website
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The basic contents of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Some Immediate Tasks of Party Ideological Work for Modeling the Whole Society on Kimilsungism" was posted by the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on its website on February 16.
					 The work, published on February 19, Juche 63 (1974), deals with the idea that modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism is the supreme programme of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 It also indicates important tasks and ways arising in the party ideological work for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige disparo de nuevo cohete teledirigido antitanque
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige disparo de nuevo cohete teledirigido antitanque
Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ACNC) -- Los cientificos y obreros de la defensa nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea elaboraron al cabo de tantas investigaciones tesoneras y a estilo coreano una arma nueva teledirigida antitanque y realizaron el disparo de prueba final con la participacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					   Cuando el Mariscal dio la orden de disparo, se lanzaron los cohetes contra los blancos, los cuales se hicieron anicos.
					
					   El Mariscal dijo sonriente que fue un disparo digno de ver y apunto que es el mas largo en el mundo el alcance de tiro de aquel cohete elaborado por nuestra clase obrera de la rama belica como cohete portatil antitanque teledirigido por radar. 
					
					   Senalo muy satisfecho que es muy alta la certeza del cohete como fusiles con mirilla telescopica y que es tan sorprendente su capacidad de atravesar y destruir el blindaje que seran inutiles ante ese cohete los tanques y carros blindados enemigos de cualquier tipo, que se jactan de la avanzada capacidad movil y de ataque.
					
					   Asevero que el nuevo cohete antitanque refleja de manera sintetizada la idea estrategica militar de nuestro Partido sobre la guerra guerrillera y refleja tambien con mas exactitud su idea de aplicar en los armamentos la alta precision y aligeramiento. Apunto muy orgulloso que el cohete probado esta vez se puede llamar como arma del Juche bien conveniente a la realidad de nuestro pais y agrego que este arma del Juche permite conocer bien cuan justa la orientacion de nuestro partido de aplicar en los armamentos la alta precision y aligeramiento.
					
					   Los datos tecnologicos de combate del cohete teledirigido antitanque llegaron perfectamente a la meta presentada por el Partido, senalo y dio la orden de producirlos en cadena cuanto antes para emplazarlos en varios pliegues en las unidades del frente y de defensa costera, que cazaran con certeza los tanques y carros blindados enemigos en el tiempos de emergencia.
					
					   El Mariscal dio agradecimiento en nombre de la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea a los cientificos y tecnicos y a la fabrica que inventaron y perfeccionaron el sistema del cohete en cuestion.
					
					   El dominio de investigacion sobre las ciencias de defensa nacional y todos los obreros de esa rama deben concentrar toda fuerza en desarrollar a nuestro estilo las armas tipicas convenientes a las condiciones geograficas de nuestro pais y a la constitucion fisica de los uniformados coreanos, recalco y presento las tareas combativas para cumplirse por el frente de industria belica durante el tiempo de la campana de 70 dias y este ano.
					
					   Le acompanaron el vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Ri Myong Su, jefe del Estado Mayor del EPC, el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres Yun Tong Hyon, viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres Jo Nam Jin, subjefe organizativo de la Direccion Politica General del EPC y los subjefes de departamento del Comite Central del PTC, Jo Yong Won, Hong Yong Chil, Kim Chang Gwang y Kim Jong Sik.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia maniobras anti-Chongryon de reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia maniobras anti-Chongryon de reaccionarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, los gangsteres policiacos de Japon arrestaron al presidente de una compania comercial compatriota so pretexto del "caso de exportacion ilicita" a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Rodong Sinmun, en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 27, lo califica de una provocacion politica intencional y planificada, encaminada a manchar el prestigio y la imagen de la digna Chongryon (Asociacion de los Coreanos Residentes en Japon) y recrudecer mas la presion contra esa entidad y continua:
					
					Arremeter a menudo a los organos de la Chongryon y pesquisarlos a fuerza tratandolos como una organizacion de crimen, lo que es un metodo rutinario de los reaccionarios japoneses para reprimir la Chongryon.
					
					Las presentes locuras demuestran fehacientemente la maldad, la bajeza y el chovinismo nacional de Japon que intenta racionalizar sus maniobras criminales anti-Chongryon al divulgar ampliamente a toda la sociedad la opinion publica anti-Chongryon.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses abrigan una malsana intencion de separar de la Chongryon a los comerciantes e industriales compatriotas , al tildar de "organizacion que se dedican solo a los actos ilicitos" a las organizaciones de los comerciantes e industriales y las entidades economicas de coreanos residentes en Japon que libran las actividades economicas legitimas.
					
					Lo mas problematico es que la presente pesquisa forzosa se cometio unos dias despues de ser publicada por las autoridades japonesas la "medida de sancion" por separado, cuyo contenido es restringir las actividades legitimas de la Chongryon y pisotear la vida y los derechos de los coreanos residentes en Japon.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses deben meditar de las graves consecuencias que se emanen de sus maniobras anti-Chongryon.
